Module vegmod

 62 :       
 63 :       
 64 :            
 65 :       module vegmod
 66 : !***********************************************************************
 67 : !*  Module defining variables and parameters for the vegetation model
 68 : !*  (transpmodel).
 69 : !*----------------------------------------------------------------------
 70 : 
 71 :       implicit none
 72 : 
 73 :       INTEGER :: optmode
 74 : 
 75 : !TODO: replace the following variable names
 76 : ! M___ by layer
 77 : !
 78 : 
 79 :       REAL*8  :: oa     ! O2 mole fraction
 80 :       REAL*8  :: ca_    ! CO2 mole fraction
 81 :       REAL*8  :: alpha      ! Initial slope of electron transport curve
 82 :       REAL*8  :: rlratio    ! Ratio of leaf respiration to photosynthetic capacity
 83 :       REAL*8  :: k25        ! Temperature response parameter
 84 :       REAL*8  :: kopt       ! Temperature response parameter
 85 :       REAL*8  :: ha_        ! Temperature response parameter
 86 :       REAL*8  :: hd         ! Temperature response parameter
 87 :       REAL*8  :: tstart     ! Start parameter for topt to calculate jmax(temp in K)
 88 :       REAL*8  :: toptfac    ! Parameter to calculate adaptation of topt (range 0-1 for no to full adaptation)
 89 :       REAL*8  :: cpccf      ! Water transport costs per m root depth and m^2 cover
 90 :       REAL*8  :: tcf        ! Turnover cost factor for foliage (tc=tcf*LAI)
 91 : 
 92 :       INTEGER :: parsaved = 0       ! Indicator whether input parameter values have been read and saved
 93 :       INTEGER :: ny_                ! Number of years to process
 94 :       INTEGER :: nyt                ! Number of years after which to perform initial test of netass 
 95 :       INTEGER :: firstyear          ! First year for the generation of hourly output in computation mode
 96 :       INTEGER :: lastyear           ! Last year for the generation of hourly output in computation mode
 97 : 
 98 : 
 99 :       REAL*8, PARAMETER :: a__    = 1.6d0             ! Ratio of diffusivities of water vapour to CO2 in air
100 :       REAL*8, PARAMETER :: pi     = 3.14159d0         ! Pi-constant
101 :       REAL*8, PARAMETER :: mpbar  = 10.2d0            ! Conversion factor from MPa to bar
102 :       REAL*8, PARAMETER :: g___   = 9.81d0            ! Gravitational acceleration
103 :       REAL*8, PARAMETER :: rho    = 1000.d0           ! Density of water
104 :       REAL*8, PARAMETER :: degree = 0.0174533d0       ! Conversion from degree to radians
105 :       REAL*8, PARAMETER :: E__    = 2.7182818d0       ! Eurler's number
106 :       REAL*8, PARAMETER :: R__    = 8.314d0           ! Molar gas konstant
107 : 
108 :       INTEGER :: N__          ! Number of days to process
109 :       INTEGER :: Nh_          ! Number of hours to process
110 :       INTEGER :: yr_          ! Year
111 :       INTEGER :: dtest        ! Number of days for initial check if netass>0
112 :       INTEGER :: pos_         ! Lowest soil layer containing tree roots
113 :       INTEGER :: posg         ! Lowest soil layer containing grass roots
114 :       INTEGER :: postemp_     ! Lowest soil layer containing tree roots within unsaturated zone
115 :       INTEGER :: postempg     ! Lowest soil layer containing grass roots within unsaturated zone
116 :       INTEGER :: pos1(1)      ! Pointer to variable values that achieved maximum assimilation
117 :       INTEGER :: pos2(2)      ! pointer to variable values that achieved maximum net assimilation
118 : 
119 :       REAL*8, ALLOCATABLE  :: srad(:)           ! Daily shortwave radiation
120 :       REAL*8, ALLOCATABLE  :: tmin(:)           ! Daily minimum temperature (K)
121 :       REAL*8, ALLOCATABLE  :: tmax(:)           ! Daily maximum temperature (K)
122 :       REAL*8, ALLOCATABLE  :: rainvec(:)        ! Daily rainfall
123 :       REAL*8, ALLOCATABLE  :: netassvec(:)      ! Daily net assimilation by trees
124 :       REAL*8, ALLOCATABLE  :: epan(:)           ! Daily pan evaporation
125 :       REAL*8, ALLOCATABLE  :: vpvec(:)          ! Daily vapour pressure (Pa)
126 :       REAL*8, ALLOCATABLE  :: netassvecg(:)     ! Daily net assimilation by grasses
127 :       REAL*8, ALLOCATABLE  :: press(:)          ! Daily air pressure (Pa)
128 :       REAL*8, ALLOCATABLE  :: cavec(:)          ! Daily atmospheric CO2 mole fraction
129 : 
130 :       INTEGER, ALLOCATABLE :: year(:)           ! Year for each day
131 :       INTEGER, ALLOCATABLE :: month(:)          ! Month for each day
132 :       INTEGER, ALLOCATABLE :: day(:)            ! Day of month
133 :       INTEGER, ALLOCATABLE :: dayyear(:)        ! Day of year
134 : 
135 :       REAL*8, ALLOCATABLE  :: parvec(:)         ! Daily photosynthetically active radiation
136 :       REAL*8, ALLOCATABLE  :: parh(:)           ! Hourly photosynthetically active radiation
137 :       REAL*8, ALLOCATABLE  :: vdh(:)            ! Hourly vapour deficit (VPD/air pressure)
138 :       REAL*8, ALLOCATABLE  :: tairh(:)          ! Hourly air temperature (K)
139 :       REAL*8, ALLOCATABLE  :: gammastarvec(:)   ! Hourly value for CO2 compensation point
140 :       REAL*8, ALLOCATABLE  :: rainh(:)          ! Hourly rainfall
141 :       REAL*8, ALLOCATABLE  :: cah(:)            ! Hourly atmospheric CO2 mole fraction
142 :       
143 :       REAL*8, ALLOCATABLE :: hruptkvec(:)       ! Hourly root water uptake by trees in each layer
144 :       REAL*8, ALLOCATABLE :: ruptkvec_d(:)      ! Daily root water uptake by trees in each layer
145 :       REAL*8, ALLOCATABLE :: hruptkg(:)         ! Hourly root water uptake by grasses in each layer
146 :       REAL*8, ALLOCATABLE :: ruptkg_d(:)        ! Daily root water uptake by grasses in each layer
147 :       REAL*8, ALLOCATABLE :: reff(:)            ! Relative root water uptake efficiency for trees in each layer
148 :       REAL*8, ALLOCATABLE :: reffg(:)           ! Relative root water uptake efficiency for grasses in each layer
149 :       REAL*8, ALLOCATABLE :: rsurfvec(:)        ! Root surface area of trees in each layer
150 :       REAL*8, ALLOCATABLE :: rsurfnewvec(:)     ! Adjusted root surface area of trees in each layer for next day
151 :       REAL*8, ALLOCATABLE :: rsurfg_(:)         ! Root surface area of grasses in each layer
152 :       REAL*8, ALLOCATABLE :: rsurfgnew(:)       ! Adjusted root surface area of grasses in each layer for next day
153 :       REAL*8, ALLOCATABLE :: prootmvec(:)       ! Root hydraulic head in each layer
154 :       REAL*8, ALLOCATABLE :: phydrostaticvec(:) ! Hydrostatic head in each layer relative to soil surface
155 :       REAL*8, ALLOCATABLE :: rsoilvec(:)        ! Resistance to water flow towards roots in each soil layer
156 : 
157 :       REAL*8  :: error        ! Cumulative error in water balance
158 :       REAL*8  :: jact_(3)     ! Electron transport rates for different values of Jmax (jact_(2) is actual value)
159 :       REAL*8  :: lambda_      ! Target dE/dA for calculating gstom__
160 :       REAL*8  :: gstom__      ! Tree stomatal conductance 
161 :       REAL*8  :: rl__(3)      ! Tree leaf respiration for different values of Jmax (rl__(2) is actual value)
162 :       REAL*8  :: vd__         ! Atmospheric vapour deficit (VPD/air pressure)
163 :       REAL*8  :: transp_      ! Tree transpiration rate
164 :       REAL*8  :: hass_(3)     ! Tree hourly assimilation rate for different values of Jmax (hass_(2) is actual value)
165 :       REAL*8  :: cpcc_        ! Tree water transport costs as a function of projected cover and rooting depth (mol/m2/s)
166 :       REAL*8  :: rr_          ! Tree root respiration rate (mol/m2/s)
167 :       REAL*8  :: lambdafac    ! Factor for calculating lambda_
168 :       REAL*8  :: gammastar    ! CO2 compensation point
169 :       REAL*8  :: jmax__(3)    ! Tree photosynthetic electron transport capacity
170 :       REAL*8  :: jmax25_(3)   ! Tree photosynthetic electron transport capacity at 25oC
171 : !d      REAL*8  :: netassyr
172 :       REAL*8  :: rainyr       ! Annual rainfall
173 :       REAL*8  :: epanyr       ! Annual pan evaporation
174 :       REAL*8  :: paryr        ! Annual photosynthetically active radiation
175 :       REAL*8  :: radyr        ! Annual shortwave radiation
176 :       REAL*8  :: vdyr         ! Mean annual atmospheric vapour deficit
177 :       REAL*8  :: etyr         ! Annual total transpiration
178 :       REAL*8  :: evapyr       ! Annual soil evaporation rate
179 : !d      REAL*8  :: gppyr
180 :       REAL*8  :: etmg_y       ! Annual grass transpiration
181 :       REAL*8  :: assg_y       ! Annual grass assimilation
182 :       REAL*8  :: rlg_y        ! Annual grass leaf respiration
183 :       REAL*8  :: rrg_y        ! Annual grass root respiration
184 :       REAL*8  :: cpccg_y      ! Annual grass water transport costs
185 :       REAL*8  :: tcg_y        ! Annual grass foliage turnover costs
186 :       REAL*8  :: etmt_y       ! Annual tree transpiration
187 :       REAL*8  :: asst_y       ! Annual tree assimilation
188 :       REAL*8  :: rlt_y        ! Annual tree leaf respiration
189 :       REAL*8  :: rrt_y        ! Annual tree root respiration
190 :       REAL*8  :: cpcct_y      ! Annual tree water transport costs
191 :       REAL*8  :: tct_y        ! Annual tree foliage turnover costs
192 :       REAL*8  :: daylength    ! Day length (hours)
193 :       REAL*8  :: tair         ! Air temperature (K)
194 :       REAL*8  :: vp_          ! Atmospheric vapour deficit (VPD/air pressure)
195 :       REAL*8  :: topt_        ! Optimal temperature in temperature response curve
196 :       REAL*8  :: rootdepth    ! Tree rooting depth (m)
197 :       REAL*8  :: mq_          ! Tree water content
198 :       REAL*8  :: mqssmin      ! Tree water content at turgor loss point
199 :       REAL*8  :: dmq          ! Rate of change in tree water content
200 :       REAL*8  :: mqnew        ! Tree water content in next time step
201 :       REAL*8  :: mqss_        ! Tree water content at steady state
202 :       REAL*8  :: mqold        ! Previous tree water content
203 :       REAL*8  :: hruptk_      ! Hourly tree root water uptake
204 :       REAL*8  :: tc_          ! Tree foliage turnover costs
205 :       REAL*8  :: mqssnew      ! Tree water content in next time step
206 :       REAL*8  :: lambdagfac   ! Factor for calculating lambdag
207 :       REAL*8  :: wsgexp       ! Exponent for calculating lambdag
208 :       REAL*8  :: cpccg(3)     ! Grass water transport costs
209 :       REAL*8  :: tcg(3)       ! Grass foliage turnover costs
210 :       REAL*8  :: jmax25g(3)   ! Grass photosynthetic electron transport capacity at 25oC
211 :       REAL*8  :: wsexp        ! Exponent for calculating lambda_
212 :       REAL*8  :: rgdepth      ! Grass rooting depth
213 :       REAL*8  :: lambdag      ! Target dE/dA for calculating gstomg__
214 :       REAL*8  :: rrg          ! Grass root respiration
215 :       REAL*8  :: jmaxg__(3)   ! Grass electron transport capacity
216 :       REAL*8  :: rlg__(3,3)   ! Grass leaf respiration
217 :       REAL*8  :: jactg(3,3)   ! Grass electron transport rate
218 :       REAL*8  :: gstomg__(3,3)! Grass stomatal conductance
219 :       REAL*8  :: etmg__(3,3)  ! Grass transpiration rate (m/s)
220 :       REAL*8  :: transpg(3,3) ! Grass transpiration rate (mol/m2/s)
221 :       REAL*8  :: hassg(3,3)   ! Hourly grass assimilation
222 :       REAL*8  :: hetmg        ! Hourly grass transpiration
223 :       REAL*8  :: assg_d(3,3)  ! Daily grass assimilation
224 :       REAL*8  :: jmaxg_d      ! Daily grass electron transport capacity
225 :       REAL*8  :: gstomg_d     ! Daily average stomatal conductance
226 :       REAL*8  :: etmg_d       ! Daily grass transpiration
227 :       REAL*8  :: rlg_d        ! Daily grass leaf respiration
228 :       REAL*8  :: netassg_d(3,3)     ! Daily grass net carbon profit
229 :       REAL*8  :: rootlim(3,3)       ! Indicator whether root surface are was limiting root water uptake
230 :       REAL*8  :: changef            ! Change factor for adjusting root surface area
231 : 
232 :       REAL*8  :: md_          ! Tree dry mass per unit ground area
233 :       REAL*8  :: mqx_         ! Tree maximum water content per ground area
234 :       REAL*8  :: rsurfmin     ! Minimum root area per m^3 to be maintained
235 :       REAL*8  :: rsurfinit    ! Initial root surface area per m^3
236 :       REAL*8  :: rootrad      ! Average fine root radius
237 :       REAL*8  :: rrootm       ! Root water uptake resistivity in soil
238 :       REAL*8  :: pcgmin       ! Minimum grass pc; initial point for growth
239 :       REAL*8  :: prootmg      ! Constant root balance pressure of 1.5 MPa in grasses
240 :       REAL*8  :: mdf          ! Total dry mass of living tissues of trees per unit pc (g/m^2)
241 :       REAL*8  :: mqxf         ! Total water storage capacity in living tissues of trees per unit md
242 :       REAL*8  :: mdstore      ! Wood water storage parameter of trees
243 :       REAL*8  :: growthmax    ! Parameter determining maximum daily growth increment of root surface area
244 : 
245 :       REAL*8  :: ruptk_d      ! Daily tree root water uptake
246 :       REAL*8  :: jmax_d       ! Mean daily tree electron transport capacity
247 :       REAL*8  :: rl_d         ! Daily tree leaf respiration
248 :       REAL*8  :: gstom_d      ! Mean daily tree stomatal conductance
249 :       REAL*8  :: ass_d(3)     ! Daily tree assimilation
250 :       REAL*8  :: spgfcf_d     ! Daily seepage face flow
251 :       REAL*8  :: infx_d       ! Daily infiltration excess runoff
252 :       REAL*8  :: etm_d        ! Daily transpiration rate
253 :       REAL*8  :: esoil_d      ! Daily soil evaporation rate
254 :       REAL*8  :: vd_d         ! Mean daily atmospheric vapour deficit
255 :       REAL*8  :: time         ! Seconds of hour
256 :       REAL*8  :: dtmq         ! Maximum timestep allowed by tree water content change
257 :       
258 :       
259 :       
260 :       end module vegmod
